analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/32/0xa27c8bbc460b93b0fa911bfdd8a43efb717aa6ca.sol:
	Contract LemurToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xa27c8bbc460b93b0fa911bfdd8a43efb717aa6ca.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

LemurToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xa27c8bbc460b93b0fa911bfdd8a43efb717aa6ca.sol#196-197)
